players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie has discovered that Alice is the mafioso. We need to act fast."
Bob: "Charlie, your accusation is serious. Alice, do you have anything to say in your defense?"
You: "I understand why Charlie would suspect me, but accusing without proof only divides the town. We need to focus on finding the real threat together."
Bob: "Charlie, since you claim to have investigated Alice, can you share any details on how you reached that conclusion? We need to be sure before making a decision."
You: "Charlie, your accusation is bold, but you haven't shared your investigation results. Please tell us who you investigated and what you found so we can trust your claim."
